Yes, I see you point, but you might as well switch teams, suicide into your
own team, then switch back.

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:alternate_dph@...]
Sent: Sunday, August 31, 2003 12:43 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Re: Negative Items


<shigekims@c...> wrote:
> The harmful items sound provocative, but tell me: whats the point of
cheats that hurt you?

There is a cheat code that let you control opponents. Hypothetically,
one could take over an opponent for the sole purpose of weakening him.
